item.title: VMware - PowerCLI 6.5.1 Cheat Sheet
item.description:
SII Ouest VMware team has published a PowerCli Cheatsheet with most common commands of the VMware PowerShell SDK to manage vSphere environments.

The cheat sheet is open-sourced and published in the SII Group GitHub page.

Online html version is available in the following page : cheat-sheets/powercli

Printable PDF can be download here: PDF

Feel free to suggest or commit modification in the repository to enhance those 2 pages.
